 table:opeitms already exist :opeitms_uky1 
 Therefore drop  CONSTRAINT  :opeitms_uky1
	    and  create TABLE_CONSTRAINTS :opeitms_uky1 
 table:opeitms already exist :opeitms_uky2 
 Therefore drop  CONSTRAINT  :opeitms_uky2
	    and  create TABLE_CONSTRAINTS :opeitms_uky2 
 create TABLE_CONSTRAINTS :opeitms_uky3
